name: semiquaver
text: Comic sans is shit.  What's wrong with that?

name: achilleselbow
text: Yes, this is what the slobbering masses fail to comprehend. Fortunately, the most recent strips (as of posting time) have been pretty solid in terms of laughs contained within the actual strip that I can send to my non-Achewood-reading friends (yes, imagine such people exist!)

name: boredom_man
text: Achilles' Elbow, you're a good guy. But when a young man in a Rick Deckard haircut and a soul patch starts telling me of the slobbering masses of the Intarwebs, I just burst into uncontrollable giggles. I'm sure you understand.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Dude, comic sans is the lamest font ever designed by a nerd anywhere. I still don't think they beat that guy's ass hard enough. A chubby for you for your stance!

name: deusoma
text: I believe he meant that the strip in which they beat up the man who invented Comic Sans was a bad Achewood strip.

text: The internet is serious business!

text: to describe the internet

name: selbencoirlo
text: I'm sorry I had to lame that even though I didn't mean it. I just had to. I'm so sorry.

name: semiquaver
text: Gonna make an effort to be a positive role model here

name: saint
text:
You will lookbat these two posts a year from now and know why.

...also, you're taking getting lamed on a comic messageboard personally.
Wait 'til you see how you feel about that one in a year.

name: flynn
text: Go ahead dude, take the rest of the day off.

name: thelastwhiteman
text: I was gonna swoop in all sweet saying I think that there is an error in the alt-text. I thought Chris meant to pen "clamor", but instead I learned a new word. Me for learning, and you for sharing! Magical.

name: captainpeepers
text:
You're doing the world a great service, friend. Do not be shamed by your actions, embrace them!

Also, like, I didn't know what the alt text was before your post, so like, thanks.

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: have you tried...beers?

name: jawsh
text: this...weekend i got...mad rutty

name: silver_lake
text: An Achewood in the old style. I hope it isn't curbed.

text: A comment left by gussiejives was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by kylank, TonyHighwind, BillyLK, werthog42, cbtbone)

name: tonyhighwind
text: You've never even watched that show, have you?

name: happycakeoven
text: It reminds me of that YouTube "bro rape" video...but better.

name: hellofyellin
text: Ray and Teo's relationship has developed to the point where he doesn't even need to hear Teo say, "What the fucking fuck?" to know he needs to explain himself.

name: lateadopter
text: I'm glad to see more of Teodor, but there are parts of him I could see less of. His legs. They weren't always little black sticks . Less freaky deer leg, more freakin' cranberry dingus!

name: steerpike66
text: I agree; Theodor has horrible little medieval minstrel's legs, like somebody that should be prancing lewdly to the musicke of ye sackbutte ynd ye lute.

name: fielding
text:
I think that his legs are the same size as they've always been, but from this distance, in black...leg coverings...and in comparison to his...pantaloons...they look like sticks.

Fear not!

name: apatfan
text: yeah man, it's all perspective.  He's keeping with artistic integrity and junk.

name: lateadopter
text:
From my perspective, Teodor had more integrity back in the day when he used to show us his junk. Freedom, man! Now it's "Graphic Design - In About An Hour!" Still wearing that sweater from some female he never met. Little spindle legs in stockings and poofy minstrel pants. Those things go together somehow.

Wait, I'm sorry, it's not Fuck You Friday. Well, I'm Fucked Monday will just have to be good enough.

name: equinn2006
text: This one scores high marks simply for its title.

name: gmm
text: As a teenager, I would take offence if it wasn't SO VERY true

name: centipede_damascus
text: Those mannequins are so realistic. Next they will talk about the coed they both slept on accident.

name: duskbringer
text:
Brah. "That totally sucks, brah ".
I hope this one's going somewhere.

name: plummet
text: cool story, bro

name: linnea
text: This is probably the setup for something bigger.

name: rogergs
text: IT ... MUST HAVE BEEN ... ALL THE EXCITEMENT ... FROM PLAYING TOUCH FOOTBALL IN THE SNOW ... WITH THE GUYS ... WEARING ONLY ... OUR 100% EGYPTIAN COMBED COTTON BRIEFS ... BRAH

name: apatfan
text: who the hell plays touch football in the snow? the whole point of snow football is that it doesn't hurt as much when you get slammed into the ground!

name: rogergs
text: No, the whole point of snow football is that the bracing cold makes manly nipples stand to attention on sculpted pecs.  TEN ...... HUT!

name: havenless
text: Onstad got the idea for this strip from an acid flashback.

name: steerpike66
text:
My first thought when Theodor taps Ray is that he thinks that Ray is himself an ultra realistic mannequin and is testing to see if. Which makes NO sense, since Ray hasn't told him what's going on yet. But who would look for sense in such a surreal strip as this? Unless they were a horribly hung-over teacher in an over-heated room; then he might start seeking for reverse logic in a cartoon.

Plus, those frat-boy mannequins should start comparing abs. Dude, CUT!

name: matthearn
text: Nah, I'm pretty sure he knows Ray is just lost in thought, and needs to be reminded that T has no fucking clue what he's talking about.

text: [IMGS OFF]

text:
Let's try flickr...

name: jackparsons
text: I got kicked out for not being white.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: This makes somehow less than zero sense.

name: tekende
text: It does not make less than zero sense. Look at A&F's catalog sometime and visit one of their stores. You will not find racial diversity therein.

name: pyromancer
text: I work with both of those mannequin guys and they're the same guy.

name: twotonturkey
text: except with the real guys, you have to see their puka shell necklace and frosted tips sticking out from beneath a white baseball cap with a pre-thrashed brim, cocked ever so slightly sideways up top and the cargo shorts/sandal combo on the bottom.

name: alzuna
text: Yea, I know I for one would definitely rather have two mannequins sitting behind me in Biology 1010 than the real thing. It's impossible to pay attention in that class, let alone with two morons going on about their frat party......Bla.

name: fmercury
text: You pretty much nailed it.

name: molesticide
text:
what are the ellipses representative of?

electronic delay? hangover? pauses for tension?

name: neonfreon
text: they represent teenagers

name: mugi
text: I don't think teenagers can be expressed through punctuation.

name: charchar
text:
I would be a semicolon; I just connect all these independent clauses; after a while sometimes they go to strange and wonderful places; one must be wary of sharks in these lands; Iceland is known for its sharks; sharks don't love you back; you are food.

represent

name: stevepants
text: I can't believe the rating is so low, i havn't laughed that loud at achewood in a long time. I guess I hate Bro's more than most people.

name: waldo913
text: I'm with you, mister pants. Bro's are one of the primary scourges of modern society.  I also like your avatar.  Have a chubby.

name: evolume
text: Mannequins are the only thing in AF wearing shirts.  Judging by the models alone you'd think AF only sold chest oil.

name: rhymesforkids
text: i don't get this one. so he's investing in talking fraternal mannequin torsos? i can't see the money in that

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Have you never seen the average patron at such as Abercrombie or American Eagle or Aeropostale? Like honey to bears, these talking fratboy mannequins would be.

name: tekende
text: I think the average Abercrombie patron would probably talk back to the mannequins for a while. Whole conversations with plastic men.

name: bixschmix
text:
"Did you go to the ... pika party brah?"
"I... nailed some theta slut... and fuckin'... ralphed in her shoes, man!"
"Right... on."

name: epicurus
text: Fucking awesome

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
when at the mall, i always jump into the entry way of A&F and dance like a moron to the techno jams they are always hella blastin'.

...and whoever i'm with always keeps walking.
